Text.Page:
The federation supports us here because we track wildlife and plants for the Mysterium.

No reports, no support. {@LinkCreature:71#3018#Meiga} is missing one. Help him get it.

Hmph. If {@LinkCreature:71#3001#Arisel} wants her reports on time, we should recruit baraka.

Aah, here's the slowpoke. Probably just lost track of time.

Report?

Aaah, right!

Took some cub time and let it get away from me. Don't worry, though. It's done.

Here's the report.

Between the golems and the sloth-infested ruins, I had no idea how to send it in!

Didn't send it because nothing's changed!

Golem cuts grass. Golem goes nuts. Golem breaks down. Golem's replaced by a new golem.

The days fly by!

The sloths ate the last one.

Not the reportâ€”the observer! No, really!
Tell Meiga I'd think a lot better if I had better rations.

Report? Oh, right!

Lemme just fill this out....

And that's the last one for today.

I imagine it's not like this in the army, eh?
